nodes.description: 第一次炸弹袭击发生在摩加迪沙萨菲亚酒店外，造成231人死亡、275人受伤，该酒店位于政府机构集中区域
nodes.support_text: Police said a truck bomb exploded outside the Safari Hotel at the K5 intersection, which is lined with government offices, restaurants and kiosks, flattening buildings and setting vehicles on fire.

nodes.description: 两小时后，麦地那区发生第二次爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: A separate blast struck the Medina district two hours later.

nodes.description: 参议员Abshir Abdi Ahmed汇总医院数据，确认死亡人数并指出大量遗体未身份确认
nodes.support_text: Abshir Abdi Ahmed said the toll comes from doctors at hospitals he has visited in Mogadishu.

nodes.description: 红会声明4名志愿者死亡，警告失踪人员可能增加
nodes.support_text: The Red Cross said four volunteers with the Somali Red Crescent Society are among the dead and warned 'this figure may rise as there are a number of volunteers still missing.'

nodes.description: 救援人员使用火炬搜索萨菲亚酒店废墟下的幸存者
nodes.support_text: Overnight, rescue workers with torch lights searched for survivors trapped under the rubble of the largely destroyed Safari Hotel.

nodes.description: 总统宣布实施三天全国哀悼，并呼吁民众献血救助伤者
nodes.support_text: President Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed declared three days of mourning and joined thousands of people who responded to a desperate plea by hospitals to donate blood for the wounded victims.

nodes.description: 政府将袭击归咎于与基地组织关联的青年党，总理谴责袭击针对平民
nodes.support_text: Somalia’s government blamed the al-Qaida-linked al-Shabaab extremist group for the attack it called a 'national disaster.'

nodes.description: 美国与Somalia信息部长共同谴责袭击，强调反恐合作
nodes.support_text: American and Somali information ministers condemned the attack, emphasizing counterterrorism cooperation.

nodes.description: 警方确认卡车炸弹爆炸细节
nodes.support_text: Police said the toll comes from doctors at hospitals he has visited in Mogadishu.

nodes.description: 医院因高伤亡人数而挣扎应对
nodes.support_text: 医院因高伤亡人数而挣扎应对

nodes.description: 官员担心死亡人数会继续上升
nodes.support_text: 官员担心死亡人数会继续上升

nodes.description: 许多人因伤口在医院去世
nodes.support_text: 许多人因伤口在医院去世
语义描述：爆炸前外立的防爆墙

nodes.description: 爆炸摧毁了金属大门和防爆墙

nodes.description: 索马里军方撤离受伤男子
nodes.support_text: 索马里军方撤离受伤男子

Many died at hospitals from their wounds, Police Captain Mohamed Hussein said.
人群回应医院献血呼吁发生在捐赠行为之前
